files.content:
# Node dependencies
node_modules/

# Logs
logs
*.log
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# Environment variables
.env
.env.local
.env.*.local

# Build output
dist/
build/
out/

# Temporary files
.tmp/
temp/

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# IDE specific
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp

# Coverage reports
coverage/

# Optional npm package lock files
package-lock.json
yarn.lock
pnpm-lock.yaml
